PROJECT

These are the projects I have worked on for work, school, competitions, and personal interests.
Please click the project name for detailed description or demo.

NAOBEARD

A generic model of robot that can tell a story multimodally.

PISA

A web application that removes people in the background of an input photo.

Save the Ocean

A VR application to raise environmental awareness.

Fraud Account

A system that checks whether a given bank account or phone number has been used for fraudulent transactions.

Criminal IP

A system that detects malicious IPs and provides their history.

Minsim

A system that monitors online community trends based on big data.

InstaBoost

A script that predicts like counts of a photo can get on Instagram using CNN and Random Forest.

AlbaLaw

A labor attorney chatbot for South Korean part-time workers

SMOG

A first-person view shooting arcade game.

Chinese Tutor

A chatbot that searches meaning of Chinese words or shows the tone and pronunciation.

Proefpersonenpool Alarm

Sends a telegram notification if there is a new experiment slot available.

Smart Dialog Agent

Developed a part of Smart Dialog Trigger used for chatbot, and improved the quality of the whole engine.
